channel.title: Forensics Docker
channel.description:
I got sick of my forensics workstation always missing key dependencies upon updates, so i decided to containerise all my tools. It's ideal for ctf challenges, if you want a clean installation/depend on a rolling distribution/don't want to waste resources on VMs.
Check it out here: https://hub.docker.com/r/nov3mb3r/dfir/

item.title: Forensics Docker
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed after 30 days. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic
